name: div
features: Weighted Base: 10 lb "claw" base for rock-solid stability on any surface
Base Design: Claw shape provides superior balance on home plates, turf, grass, or concrete
Adjustability: One-hand adjustable height for seamless training transitions
Construction: Reinforced steel stem engineered for long-term durability
Top Feature: Patented hand-rolled Flextop allows hitters to feel the ball, not the tee
Stability Performance: Remains upright through mis-hits and high-rep sessions
Portability: Stem unscrews from the base for compact storage and easy transport
Durability: Built for commercial/pro use; withstands heavy training environments
Target Users: Trusted by pro athletes, coaches, and players at all levels
Versatility: Ideal for baseball, softball, and tee ball training
